short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Adds a friends list to LeetCode profile pages

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Enhance your LeetCode experience by adding a Friends List feature directly to your profile page and stalk them🕵️‍♂️ ! This extension allows you to effortlessly track your friends' problem-solving progress and contest ratings, making LeetCode more social and competitive.

Latest Update:
🆕Now you can see Add/Remove friends button on your friends' profile page.
🆕You can sort your friends based on names, rating or total problems solved.
🆕Bugs fixed.

Key Features:
➡️Add and manage your LeetCode friends list with ease.
➡️View detailed stats like Easy, Medium, and Hard problems solved.
➡️Hover over a friend’s name to see their more details and rating graph. 
➡️View your friends list on your leetcode profile and hover over the name to see more details here as well.
➡️Too many friends? No problem—search your existing friends list easily.

Why Use This Extension?
➡️Stay motivated by tracking your friends' progress.
➡️Compare your contest ratings and problem-solving skills.
➡️Enhance your LeetCode journey with a touch of fun and competition!

Get started today and bring your friends closer to your LeetCode journey! 🎉
